subject: I having trouble with plus X Pedal
description_text:
I have completed offset and calibration of plus X pedals according to the manual given in SIMSONN Manager.

However, games like IRacing, AC, and LMU are not recognizing the pedals. For each game, I have to go into setting and assign pedals, But the games don't recognize them.

conversations.body_text: Hi 김정호,  All three games you mentioned are supported. iRacing requires you to rebind and recalibrate the pedals in the game settings.
